entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
